Response DTO for paginated event listings that wraps a list of events with pagination metadata. This class provides a standardized format for returning multiple events from API endpoints with page navigation information.

## Key Components

- **events** - List of `EventResponse` objects containing the actual event data
- **pageInfo** - `PageInfo` object with pagination metadata (page size, total count, etc.)
- **@Schema** annotations - OpenAPI documentation for Swagger integration
- **Lombok annotations** - Auto-generated constructors, getters, setters, and builder pattern

## Usage Example

```java
// Creating a paginated events response
EventsResponse response = EventsResponse.builder()
    .events(Arrays.asList(
        EventResponse.builder().id(1L).name("Conference 2024").build(),
        EventResponse.builder().id(2L).name("Workshop").build()
    ))
    .pageInfo(PageInfo.builder()
        .currentPage(1)
        .totalPages(5)
        .totalElements(50L)
        .size(10)
        .build())
    .build();

// In a REST controller
@GetMapping("/events")
public ResponseEntity<EventsResponse> getEvents(
    @RequestParam(defaultValue = "0") int page,
    @RequestParam(defaultValue = "10") int size) {
    
    EventsResponse events = eventService.getPagedEvents(page, size);
    return ResponseEntity.ok(events);
}
```
